metadata.title: CVE-2024-25817 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in eza before version 0.18.2, allows localattackers to execute arbitrary code via the .git/HEAD, .git/refs, and.git/objects components.

criterions.comment: rust-eza package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '0.18.2-1').
